The goal of `mctq` is to provide a fast and friendly way to process Munich ChronoType Questionnaire (MCTQ) data in R.

All three MCTQ versions (standard, micro, and shift) are supported.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gipsousp/mctq")
```
